snippet: The woes of a certain segment of downtown Manhattan pale in comparison to those of many other victims of the storm, but they nonetheless provided a vivid New York City tableau all their own.
abstract: Lower Manhattan’s power outages and flooding, triggered by Hurricane Sandy, have led many downtown types to cancel Halloween parties and hunker down for what some term ‘glamping’--glamour camping with amenities.

byline.contributor: Jacob Bernstein, Bee-Shyuan Chang, Penelope Green, Guy Trebay, Joyce Wadler and Eric Wilson contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The woes of a certain segment of downtown Manhattan pale in comparison to those of many other victims of the storm, but they nonetheless provided a vivid New York City tableau all their own.

headline.seo: Glimmers of Light in Downtown Manhattan
